title: STAT+: Abridge CTO on Epic and what’s after AI scribing
description: In this edition of STAT Health Tech: Q&A with Abridge CTO, telehealth pushing multi-cancer detection tests, and Novo's lawsuit against Hims.
content: In this edition of STAT Health Tech: Q&A with Abridge CTO, telehealth pushing multi-cancer detection tests, and Novo's lawsuit against Hims.
